document_name: JPSME II Programme Document Fina l 08 09 08.doc

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: This programme is led by the office of  the president and cabinet for the 2007-2011 period.   It outlines activities  for comprehensive capacity assessments, and analyses of key service delivery ministries and common services institutions and designing of capacity development strategies. The strategies rely on both increasing the government ownership, and on working more effectively with other partners to ensure greater results on the ground.  They focus on defining specific indicators for measuring results and monitoring and accountability for those results. Subsequently the prioritised capacity development strategies will be implemented in each participating government institution and coordinated through OPC.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Support to the Development Assistance Co-ordination Unit (DACU) of the Debt & Aid Division of the Ministry of Finance to implement the Development Assistance Strategy (DAS) and domesticate the Paris Declaration

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The Project aims at strengthening and developing sustainable national systems for monitoring and evaluation of development strategies. Specifically, the expected outputs include:  (i) improved coordination mechanisms of the national M&E system for evidence-based development planning, budgeting and implementation; (ii) annual MGDS reports produced; (iii) strengthened M&E in Sectors, Assemblies, CSOs and communities; (iv) enhanced use of MASEDA and other statistics for planning and decision-making; and (v) improved national capacity for assessments, policy analysis and evaluation.

project_title: Capacity Development for Public Sector Mgmt. & Accountab
